import React, { useEffect } from 'react' function Expericenebox() { const counters = document.querySelectorAll('.value'); const speed = 200; useEffect(()=>{ counters.forEach( counter => { const animate = () => { const value = +counter.getAttribute('akhi'); const data = +counter.innerText; const time = value / speed; if(data < value) { counter.innerText = Math.ceil(data + time); setTimeout(animate, 1); }else{ counter.innerText = value; } } animate(); }); },[]) return (
Hours Behind the Lens
